title: Sacred Voxel Recursion
description: An interactive 3D exploration of sacred geometry patterns using voxel-based recursive algorithms to generate complex, meditative structures.

fullDescription.content: Sacred Voxel Recursion is an interactive 3D exploration of sacred geometry patterns using voxel-based recursive algorithms. The project generates complex, meditative structures that users can explore and interact with in real-time.

Sacred geometry has been used across cultures and throughout history to represent fundamental patterns of creation and cosmic order. This project translates these ancient concepts into the digital realm, using recursive algorithms to generate 3D voxel structures that embody principles like the Flower of Life, Metatron's Cube, and the Sri Yantra.

items.title: Pattern Selection
items.content: Choose from various sacred geometry patterns as the base for generation

items.title: Recursion Depth
items.content: Control how many levels of recursion are applied to create complexity

items.title: Color Schemes
items.content: Select different color palettes inspired by chakras and energy centers

items.title: Meditation Mode
items.content: A guided experience with breathing patterns synchronized to gentle transformations
